name: Polar (itch) (Tech Hub 2021)
description:
Our game is taking influence from platformers such as Mega Man and Shovel Knight, which have an emphasis on skill based platforming.

The player character is a snowman named Polar, he is always in danger because of the mysterious dangers of the forest and lonely, since he is the only snowman in the Boreal forest. The goal is to leave his place of origin, which is the forest and find “snowlife,” so the snowman will no longer be lonely and find peace. 

Credits: Bailey, Evan, Gurdain

Part of the Tech Hub 2021 Spring Game Jam
